title: Athlytic
content: Athlytic is a full-stack NBA analytics dashboard designed for data lovers, fantasy players, and hoop heads.
features: Player search with real-time stat cards
Flask backend scraping NBA_API and Basketball Reference
React frontend with Tailwind UI and Framer Motion
Advanced metrics: USG%, EFG%, NET_RATING, and more
AI blurbs generated from raw stats and award history
lessons: Building persistent caches to reduce fetch time
caption: Athlytic homepage — data meets design

title: What CJ Sees
content: A highly-visual, minimalist portfolio that tells a story through design, light, and perspective.
features: Hero animation section with Framer Motion
Hover interactions for color hex codes and metadata
Next.js dynamic routes for gallery images
lessons: Prioritizing design principles: whitespace, contrast, and motion
caption: Gallery showcase with motion and metadata

title: DegreeMind
content: DegreeMind helps students map out their degrees, majors, minors, and postgrad career goals with AI-guided scheduling.
features: Smart semester builder using catalog data
Path optimization toward internships and MBA tracks
Integration with school databases (e.g., GT, OSU, LSU)
lessons: Open-source backend for academic program data
JSON schema to store career-aligned tracks
caption: Soon to launch — smarter planning for students
